# Copilot Instructions

Follow the project guidelines documented in [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) at the repository root.

Key points:
- Use **Svelte 5** syntax (`$props()`, `$state()`, `{@render children()}`)
- Content lives in `src/content/` (YAML and MDsveX files)
- Components are in `src/lib/components/`
- Screenshots go in `static/screenshots/week-{n}/`
- Follow the CUNY J-School design system colors and typography
